name: PublishArtifacts-Task
description: Publish artifacts for Serena Deployment Automation
author: naked Agility Limited - Martin Hinshelwood

groups.name: Overrides
groups.displayName: Override defaults set in your Process Template .zip

inputs.name: SDAServerService
inputs.label: Serena Deployment Automation Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: The endpoint should contain both the Token for access as well a the URL of the VSTS Account that you want to connect to. You will need an endpoint per VSTS Account.

inputs.name: pathToPublish
inputs.label: Path to Publish
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Scope of files to upload.

inputs.name: artifactName
inputs.label: Artifact Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: If checked the task will poll the update service on the interval provided. Recommneded is 30 seconds.

inputs.name: artifactVersion
inputs.label: Artifact Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The version number to use. Defaults to Build Number
